titleStmt.title: The tragedy of Thierry, King of France, and his brother Theodoret as it was diverse times acted at the Blacke-Friers by the Kings Maiesties servants / written by John Fletcher, gent.
titleStmt.author: Fletcher, John, 1579-1625.

titleStmt.title: The tragedy of Thierry, King of France, and his brother Theodoret as it was diverse times acted at the Blacke-Friers by the Kings Maiesties servants / written by John Fletcher, gent.
titleStmt.author: Fletcher, John, 1579-1625.
Massinger, Philip, 1583-1640.
Beaumont, Francis, 1584-1616.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Humphrey Mosely, and are to be sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: By Fletcher, assisted by Massinger and others. cf Dict. Nat. Biog.
Other eds. have Francis Beaumont on t.p. as joint author.
Imperfect: Pages cropped, also print showthrough, with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
